casebody.data:
Lawrence Lynch, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 9, 1891. Appeal by defendants from judgment entered upon the findings and decision of a judge on a. trial at special term before the- court without a jury. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Sackett & Bennett, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Dugro, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
